name: magento_first5
description: Magento shopping application is a demo site used for simulating a realistic online shopping website ([link](https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/)). It has the following features :  1. Register 2. Login 3. Reset password 4. product list 5. shopping cart 6. Orders page 7. User account page 8. Wishlist 9. Product search 10. Product filter
